name: Epsilon IV
overview: On Earth, diamonds are scarce and therefore it was decided to use robotic miners on other planets. One such planet is the planet Pykko\Epsilon IV. You control this robot and have to scour the surface, collecting all the gems you see while avoiding the alien creatures, whose impact will be lethal to your device. Reach all the gems by jumping from one area to another in the correct order. Published in North America in Loadstar #114 and in Italy under the name Pykko in Super C64 e C128 n.46 (giugno 1990). The 1990 version had a total of 128 gems to collect, the 1993 scaled it down to just 80 gems.
